categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Moris Malvarra was a male who worked for the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Malvarra was assigned by the Alliance to be the observer of the pirate group Dharus' Buccaneers. However, before the tour of duty was one-third complete, Malvarra requested to be transferred to a different assignment. Ral'Rai Muvunc of Alliance High Command replied to the request, refusing Malvarra a transfer.
